articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Uttarkashi tunnel collapse: NDRF shows how 41 stranded workers will be rescued | Watch video | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The rescue operation to save the trapped workers in the tunnel is expected to resume soon. Reinforcements have been made to the Heavy American Auger machine, and wheeled stretchers will be used for the rescue.
articles.content: NDRF on Friday demonstrated the movement of wheeled stretchers within the pipeline to facilitate the rescue of 41 trapped workers in the Silkyara Tunnel, with plans to deploy the stretchers once the … [+2617 chars]
